content: In the beginning, the app worked fine. Recently, immediately after going through the entire process of choosing station, pump number, payment method, amount, referral to bank, filling in details there, approving, a notification that is waiting for approval from the bank. The amount has already been written off, however, the bpme app has probably already concluded while working with the banking app that this takes too long and gave an error message. After returning from the banking app, this error message is waiting and will not go away. Have emailed about this and get the answer that it has to do with LPG pump versus 'regular' pump. I wonder if other users recognize this and especially why it can take so long to make a solution for this. Especially in this time of corona, the app can be particularly useful so as not to have to go into the shop. I hope there can be a fix for this soon.
developerResponse: Jazeker, met BPme betaal je gemakkelijk vanuit je auto voor brandstof!
content_basic_clean: In beginning app worked fine Recently immediately going entire process choosing station pump number payment method amount referral bank filling detail approving notification waiting approval bank The amount already written however bpme app probably already concluded working banking app take long gave error message After returning banking app error message waiting go away Have emailed get answer LPG pump versus regular pump I wonder user recognize especially take long make solution Especially time corona app particularly useful go shop I hope fix soon
